Comments_List: I learned a lot about how the different parts of the world took different paths of development in the last couple of centuries. I gained a global perspective on problems of development, and learned to identify situations and policies that are likely to prioritize growth.
The material was broad but also analyzed at a deeper level - the coverage of the course was the perfect amount. The course should stay as is.
No improvement necessary, one of the best courses at Yale!
Yes - it provides a great overview of economic development through a historical lens
